summary: arsenal playmaker mesut ozil seemed to be in a enjoying his home comforts after arriving back in london following the international break , posting a picture putting his feet up with his dog . the german star was in fine form as the world cup winners beat georgia 2-0 in their euro 2016 qualifier on sunday , and is now setting his sights on the premier league encounter with liverpool at the weekend . and ozil gave an insight into what he does in his downtime after taking a snap of him playing with his pet with the caption : ` home sweet home ' .
